amendment.description: An amendment numbered 25 printed in Part A of House Report 117-405 to give the Mayor of the District of Columbia the same authority over the D.C. National Guard that the governors of states and territories have over their National Guards.
amendment.purpose: Amendment gives the Mayor of the District of Columbia the same authority over the D.C. National Guard that the governors of states and territories have over their National Guards.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A016) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 218 - 209 (Roll no. 323).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A016) pursuant to the rule.
